catalog_info.title: Master's Thesis Reading and Research
catalog_info.notes: This course must be taken for a letter grade.
catalog_info.description: Interdisciplinary proseminar designed to orient master's degree students in Regional Studies-Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia to theoretical and methodological approaches in the field, including research design for academic and policy research. Students must complete both parts of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
catalog_info.department: Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia
catalog_info.course_group: Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia
